title: >>> The WAITING ROOM: Part II
body_text:
DODGEBALL 20: now 2 days away ...
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
THE QUESTIONS Continued
> What was your single favorite dodgeball moment that DID NOT include you?
"The 'nut' shots."
- JUSTIN PIERCE
"Val's catch in between her legs." (DODGEBALL DAY 4)
- STEVE ADAMS
"Steve's out-of-bounds surprise attack on Diana." (DODGEBALL XIV)
- JOHN WATTERS
"If it didn't include me, why would it even stand out? Haha. Actually, I find it very entertaining when anyone is hit in the nuts. So yeah, any 'nut' shots."
- TOM ADAMS
"Plain and simple: the 'V-Shot'." (DODGEBALL 15)
- DIANA DIBUCCIO
"Whenever Travis runs to the front line, in circles, and immediately gets out."
- KRISTIN DRISCOLL
> What was your single favorite dodgeball moment that DID include you?
"My current protest of the "accursed ball" which I actually protest speaking about as well. I'll give you a hint: it's somewhere between red and yellow, and it ain't a rectangle."
- CHRIS ADAMS
"Deflecting a KJohn shot that Liz caught to end a game at Ocean Road Park." (DODGEBALL XONE)
- STEVE ADAMS
"I'm gonna have to say when I got (KJohn) in the face with the 8 ball." (D-DAY VI)
- JOHN WATTERS
"Nailing Kristin in the ovaries." (DODGEBALL 15)
- SARA DECUIR
> What was your favorite dodgeball event?
"The first dodgeball when it poured like a MFer." (DODGEBALL VII)
- JUSTIN PIERCE
"XONE."
- JOHN WATTERS
"I'd like to say DODGEBALL 18 or 19."
- LENNY HERERA
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
KJohn's dodgeball address will posted by Friday.
"DODGEBALL 20: The ClimaXX" ... December 30th, 2005.
